Richard Telford is a Associate Professor in Plant Ecology in the [Department of Biological Sciences](https://www.uib.no/en/bio), [University of Bergen](https://www.uib.no/en). 
His main research interests are in quantitative palaeoecology, and in open and reproducible science. He teaches biostatistics using R.
